title: Gamification-Enhanced Self-Regulated Learning Mathematics MOOC

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational mathematical concepts and mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: Gamification-integrated environment supporting learners' self-directed goal setting and progress management

learning_goals: Learners can independently solve daily math problems with over 80% accuracy
Learners can establish and execute self-regulated learning plans at least three times weekly on average using a gamification system
Learners can increase interaction frequency with peer learners by 50% through earning digital badges and participating in leaderboards
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
